items.sentence: The post office is about three miles from here.
Tom doesn't drink as much coffee as he used to.
A tsunami is coming, so please be on the alert.
I need a suitcase. Could I borrow one of yours?
I doubt that Tom will be able to seal the deal.
Tom only has a faint memory of his grandfather.
Up to last week, Tom had never been on a plane.
Mary always wears a bathing cap when she swims.
Tom went into the bathroom and closed the door.
Tom may not remember me, but I do remember him.
